name: Fire Transgression
description:
Created for After The End Of The World Game Jam.

Blog is here.

In Greek mythology, Prometheus is a Titan god of fire and supreme trickster. He is credited with the creation of humanity from clay, and of defying the gods by stealing fire and giving it to mankind. For this transgression, Zeus sentenced him to eternal torment. Prometheus was bound to a rock, and an eagle devoured his liver in an ongoing cycle finally ended when he was freed by Heracles.

Quoted from here

However, before Prometheus was found to be giving fire away to mankind, he decided to place the fire in a specific place and let mankind arrive there  You (as Zeus) discovered the plan, and decided to stop mankind from reaching fire before punishing Prometheus. But Prometheus was a trickster, and he modified the area so that for mankind only 9 areas can damage them (Instead of striking directly on them). Good Luck! How to Play? 9 letters will be generated randomly, representing the 9 areas' key code. Press the respective button on your keyboard to damage mankind standing on that area.
For example, if
a b c d e f g h i
appeared on the screen, press the key 'a' to deal damage to human standing on the top left square. Press the key 'b' to deal damage to human standing on the top middle square and so on.
